name: Reverse Christmas
description:
Game Instruction: 

Unlike normal Christmas where Santa will deliver presents to the good children. This is the opposite where Santa (You) steals presents from the children of the world and delivers the presents to his factory in the north pole to incinerate them and compress them into coal.

Pick up present and place them in the sled to send to the north pole. Santa can hide in the presents to avoid children and place coal in the furnace to restore health.

Upgrade your factory to make your life easier and earn more coal score.

Enjoy and Have A Great Christmas.

Created in one week for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021
#yogscastgamejam2021
